content: this is a legal case involving a property coownership dispute between two parties referred to as the plaintiff and the defendant the plaintiff filed a lawsuit against the defendant regarding a property they coown the court established that the defendant must acknowledge the plaintiffs coownership within 15 days and if they fail to do so a judgment will be issued the court also ordered the sale of the property with the proceeds divided between the parties based on their coownership share the defendant was also ordered to pay the plaintiffs litigation costs the lawsuit was filed by the plaintiff who claimed to be the legal successor of their late father the inheritance proceedings determined that the plaintiff and the defendant are registered coowners of the property the plaintiff initiated the litigation procedure to determine the division of the coownership while the defendant disputed the plaintiffs share the plaintiff emphasizes their predecessors contributions to the property while the defendant argues against the probate proceedings the plaintiff proposes an evidentiary procedure to reach a decision
